steps.name: Step 1
steps.userMessage: How many time expressions (dates, times, timestamps, relative dates) can you count in the following document?

steps.name: Step 2
steps.userMessage:
Using the given result, remove any clinically irrelevant date and build a chronologically ordered timeline and put the result into a Json array where each object of the array follows the structure:
{
    dateValue: string,
    dateString: string
    description: string,
}
Be sure that: 
- The dateValue contains the date in the format yyyy-mm-dd
- The dateString contains the date in the format "day, month in letter, full year"
- The description contains a description of what type of event occurred at that time point

steps.name: Step 3
steps.userMessage: For each element in the json array add a "line" field with the line number where the date was found.
